subject: Scouring
text:
Like a bee, 
you wanted to land―
on the snapdragon’s, 
curved lip.

Light years away―
a mouth gapes open; 
you will not, 
walk in.

A wrenching search, 
for a home, where
you will not find
the violence.

A wax palace, you 
are invited to live in.
The dummies, abound, 
without backbones.
